channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: SM Energy is acquiring Civitas in $13 billion oil and gas merger of near equals in the Permian Basin
item.description: The merger is the biggest oil and gas deal in months as the U.S. industry continues to consolidate.

item.title: This ETF is handily beating the S&P 500—and analysts say it could be one of the big winners of the AI boom
item.description: Analysts at Ned Davis Research recommend the fund as an "Overweight" investment.

item.title: Trump says he ‘won’t be extorted’ as the shutdown is about to become the longest ever—and millions could soon lose food aid
item.description: As the shutdown drags on, the White House is leaning into online trolling with fake MySpace pages and memes.
